Summary: My daughter , My wife and I were in our garage with the door open facing west when we saw this light appear and then hover above the trees . It pulsed and then started to travel to the north and gain altitude . It then made a few turns and dissappeared
divs: Sighting DetailsAt 8:22pm my daughter , my wife and I were in our garage with the door open. We all saw this light rise above the trees and start irratically move and then hover. It was pulsing yellow, orange ,and red. It started to move higher and then to the north west and then it was gone from our sight. We saw another one this Sunday the 20th at about the same time but it was faster and moved towards the southwest and became a red star like object before we lost sight of it. This can't be a lantern because it moves against the wind at times and it's way too bright. I saw another one above a plaza last year this time. It was up close and no lantern.
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Indian Harbour Beach
There were no other sightings in Indian Harbour Beach on or around January 13th 2013
